name: tx-art
description: Extension that generates a pretty and unique art piece for the transaction info page on Etherscan.

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/popup.html src/content-script.js && cd dist && zip -9 -rFS ../tx-art.zip * && cd -
scripts.zip-source: git clone -l . ./temp && rm -rf ./temp/.git && cd ./temp && zip -9 -rFS ../tx-art.zip * && cd - && rm -rf ./temp/

author: artdgn
